title: ATF6β is not essential for the development of physiological cardiac hypertrophy

abstract: Physiological cardiac hypertrophy is a compensatory remodeling of the heart in response to stimuli such as exercise training or pregnancy that is reversible and well- tolerated. We previously described how the activating transcription factor 6 (ATF6) …
